english.segment1: Feel your power. Feel your fury. Feel your glory. It's all over me
english.segment2: Your invitations got me prisoned, Got me chained, I don't want to ever leave.
english.segment3: You're my end, Yeah, you're my beginning!. You're my everything. You will be the death and life. You're my end, Yeah, you're my beginning!. You're my everything, You will be the death of life and me!
english.segment4: Seems you're jealous. Seems you're longing. Seems you're zealous to own all of me..
english.segment5: Seems I'm reckless. Seems I'm helpless. I'm consumed with the thought of know you..
english.segment7: You're my end, Yeah, you're my beginning!. You're my everything, You will be the death of life. You're my end, Yeah, you're my beginning!. You're my everything, You will be the death of life.
english.segment8: Where else could I go?. Don't even think about it!. All you have: the words of life!. Where else could I go, Where you couldn't find me?
english.segment9: You will be the death and life. You will be the death and life. You will be the death and life
english.segment10: You're my end, Yeah, you're my beginning!. You're my everything, You will be the death of life. You're my end, Yeah, you're my beginning!. You're my everything, You will be the death of life..
english.segment11: Of me!. Of me.. You will be the death of life. Of me.. Oh!. You will be the death of life. You will be the death of life. You will be the death of life of me!
